SELECT DISTINCT t.openGId,t.userId, a.address,a.avatarUrl,a.city , a.country ,a.CreateTime ,a.email,a.gender ,a.`language`,a.latitude,a.longitude,a.`name`,a.nickName,a.openid,a.phone,a.position,a.province,a.qq,a.WeChat, a.unionid,a.type,b.`name` as dname FROM `tb_qun` t LEFT JOIN tb_user a ON a.id = t.userId left join tb_unit b on b.userId = t.userId where t.openGId =#{openGId} ORDER BY t.id ASC
LIMIT ${limit}
